script:
1). When will the shipment arrive?
It left Japan yesterday.
There's no rush.
At noon tomorrow. 
2). I heard that Sally was laid off.
Just lay it on the desk, please.
Please turn on the fan.
Really? That's too bad. 
3). Didn't you used to work for Mega Firm?
Yes, I did. 
No thank you.
I love to work.
